app.title: Proxy AI Fusion
app.subtitle: High-Performance AI Proxy Service
service.claude.name: Claude
service.codex.name: Codex
dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Overview of proxy endpoints and the currently forwarded upstream configuration.
dashboard.noConfigs: No {{service}} configurations found. Create one from the Configurations page to enable requests.
dashboard.noActive: No active {{service}} configuration. Activate one from the Configurations page to start forwarding.
dashboard.error: Unable to load service data. Please check the proxy backend.
config.title: Service Configurations
config.description: Manage upstream configurations for Claude and Codex proxy endpoints
config.name: Name
config.empty.title: No {{service}} Configurations Yet
config.empty.description: Create a configuration for the {{service}} proxy to forward requests to your upstream API.
config.empty.exampleAuth: API Key or Bearer token for authentication
config.validation.name: Please enter a configuration name
config.confirmDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the configuration "{{name}}".
config.dialog.description: Configure upstream connection details for the {{service}} proxy.
config.form.apiKeyHint: API key for authentication (sent in the x-api-key header)
config.form.authTokenHint: Bearer token for authentication (sent in the Authorization header)
config.form.weightHint: Higher weight = more traffic. Use 1.0 for even distribution.
config.mode.label: Service Mode
config.mode.manualDescription: Use a single manually selected configuration
config.mode.loadBalanceDescription: Distribute requests across multiple configurations based on weight
lb.title: Load Balancer
lb.failureHint: Number of consecutive failures before marking a service as unhealthy
lb.successHint: Number of consecutive successes before marking a service as healthy
lb.freezeHint: Auto-freeze duration after failures, default 300 seconds (5 minutes)
loadbalancer.error.load: Failed to load load balancer configuration
loadbalancer.error.save: Failed to save load balancer configuration
logs.title: Request Logs
logs.confirmClearDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all request logs from the database.
logs.empty: No request logs for this service yet.
docs.title: Documentation
docs.description: Quick setup instructions for local and remote Claude/Codex tooling.
docs.common.copyFailed: Copy failed. Please copy the snippet manually.
docs.common.copyUnavailable: Clipboard access is unavailable in this browser context.
docs.claude.local.title: One-click local setup
docs.claude.local.description: Automatically back up any existing Claude Code settings and replace them with the Proxy AI Fusion defaults.
docs.claude.local.successWithBackup: Claude Code settings created at {{path}} (previous file backed up to {{backup}}).
docs.claude.local.error: Failed to create Claude Code settings: {{message}}
docs.claude.remote.title: Deploy to another machine
docs.claude.remote.description: Copy the template below to ~/.claude/settings.json on the remote machine, then replace http://localhost:8801 with the proxy server IP.
docs.claude.remote.note: Remember to update ANTHROPIC_BASE_URL to match the server address, e.g. http://your-server-ip:8801.
docs.codex.title: Codex proxy usage
docs.codex.description: Configure your OpenAI-compatible tooling to forward traffic through the Codex proxy.
docs.codex.stepProxy: Point the client base URL to http://<proxy-host>:8802 (default port from Proxy AI Fusion).
docs.codex.stepKey: Provide the API key or bearer token configured in the Codex service so requests can be authenticated.
docs.codex.stepTest: Run a smoke test (e.g. list models) to confirm the proxy returns a response before shipping to production.
docs.codex.notesDescription: Codex requests respect the same load balancer behavior configured in the application. Freeze or disable upstreams from the Configurations tab when rotating credentials.
common.errorOccurred: An error occurred while rendering this component
dashboard.noEnabledConfigs: All {{service}} configurations are disabled. Enable one to continue.
